entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net application aborts at startup with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" - .Net 7 preview 5 #70758
  • system.net.http.functional.tests crashing #70757
  • Crash in coreclr.dll!Debugger::SendException while processing stack overflow in x64 Windows #70755
  • Update .Net source generators to use new SyntaxValueProvider.ForAttributeWithMetadataName api. #70754
  • Revisit locking in SymbolicRegexBuilder #70753
    7.0.0
  • Asp.Net 6.X app fails to run as a Windows Service in Windows Server Core/Docker container #70751
  • DAC heapwalker doesn't detect memory corruption that makes objects appear to have zero size #70750
    7.0.0
  • Race condition results in Assembly reference equality being false #70742
    7.0.0
  • XML attribute is read as a null IConfigurationSection.Value starting in 6.0.0 #70733
    7.0.0
  • JsonConverter from unused JsonSerializerOptions throws for missing metadata #70732
  • StreamContent.ReadOnlyStream fails Stream conformance tests #70725
    7.0.0
  • We should flow the CancellationToken to Http2Connection.SetupAsync #70721
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT under CoreCLR debug experience #70719
  • System.IO.IOException : Unable to read data from the transport connection: 'overlapped' was not allocated by this ThreadPoolBoundHandle instance. (Parameter 'overlapped'). #70713
  • Cannot PublishReadyToRun as Visual Studio Passing too Many Arguments to Crossgen2.exe #70712
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Question about Assembly loading & Resolving #62391
  • Question: when would System.IO.FileNotFoundException get thrown? #61248
  • Crossgen2 crashes on linux-x64 #70543
  • Assembly.CodeBase obsoletion is incomplete #42857
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Fix to ActivityListener.ShouldListenTo edge case #70727
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual array property duplicates elements #70150
    Future
  • Accessing an array of ValueTuple<int[], int, ...> throws exception if code is optimized #66254
    6.0.x
  • Support for constructor binding #36389
    Future
  • Memory load calculation used by GC is not aligned with Docker and Kubernetes #63840
    7.0.0
  • [linux-arm64] Random and rare runtime crash System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException (System.Net.Sockets) #70486
    7.0.0
  • Socket.BeginAccept in .NET 6 throws an unobserved SocketException #69790
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Module.ResolveXXX doesn't work with runtime-generated methods #70722
  • The certificate that you're adding to HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates only contains the public key. The SSL connection can't happen without access to the private key. #69199
  • Plaintext benchmark regressed recently #70714
  • Failure processing application bundle. Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #68387
    7.0.0
  • MsQuicStream may throw QuicOperationAbortedException when connection is closed by peer #69481
    7.0.0
  • Cannot correlate System.Net.Http ETW events using ActivityId #70703
  • Hoisting the invariant out of multi-level nested loops #61420
    7.0.0
  • Cancellation of QuicStream.ReadAsync/WriteAsync should either abort the stream or allow subsequent reads/writes #55485
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Implement cancellation support for QuicConnection.CloseAsync #55155
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Notification that a write-only unidirectional QuicStream has been closed #51848
    7.0.0
  • ProcessStartInfo wraps quotes arround my `--option=` #70659
  • [QUIC] Support synchronous QUIC APIs #32076
    7.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator: Use public API UnreachableException #70717
  • [QUIC] ClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientAuthenticationOptions should provide some defaults #64332
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: QuicConnectionListener supports ServerOptionsSelectionCallback #49587
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Introduce properties to distiguish uni/bi directional streams #55816
    7.0.0
  • QUIC API: Consider passing QuicConnectionOptions to Quic.Connection.ConnectAsync #56009
    7.0.0
  • QuicException should be abstract and not thrown directly #56955
    7.0.0
  • Exceptions from QUIC APIs should derive from IOException #56954
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Revisit QuicStream.ReadsComplete API #57780
    7.0.0
  • QUIC API issues for 7.0 #55486
    7.0.0
  • QUIC API mega-issue #44786
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Design of Shutdown for QuicStreams in System.Net.Quic #756
    7.0.0
  • QuicStream: Consider requiring Flush to guarantee data is sent #44782
    7.0.0
  • QuicConnection.RemoteEndPoint should be IPEndPoint, not EndPoint #43000
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Finalize QUIC dispose model #32142
    7.0.0
  • Enterprise authentication tests are failing with PlatformNotSupportedException #68366
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient throws exception when using invalid username/password on Linux #416
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\", expectedErrors: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch) #69664
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly: brotli and AOT result in assert in aot-runtime.c:2038 #62806
    6.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Implement tiering within the interpreter #65369
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Shrink data section in dotnet.wasm #49224
    7.0.0
  • clang 12 - no input files [Android NDK] #70640
    Future
  • Question: how could we execute code in a standalone assembly load context? #69855
  • [wasm] Test failing because of not being able to output utf8 characters on windows - `?????` instead of `こんにちは` #58709
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Some AOT crashes on Windows, in Wasm.Build.Tests #61725
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Side effect of setting fixed debuggerProxy port #70670

PullRequests

Created

  • Add note about backward branch constraints to ECMA-335 augments #70760
    area-Meta
  • Avoid infinite loop in case of heap corruption #70759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Trying to remove a int to int cast in lowering #70756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][wasm] Fixes for OuterLoop mono pipeline #70752
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Enable addressing modes for gc types #70749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove workaround to get pauseOnExceptions setting #70748
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X" #70747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Correctly format chuncked response with Content-Length header #70744
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-compatibility, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling return address hijacking on ARM64 Windows #70740
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add CreateChained rate limiter API #70739
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix AttributePresence in composite mode #70737
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Bring up PPC64 little endian #70734
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, arch-ppc64le
  • Fix a few Stream-related issues in System.Net.Http #70731
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT Unlock assignability comparison in reflection-free #70726
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix compilation without HAVE_GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X #70723
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add limited support for LocalCertificateSelectionCallback for QUIC #70716
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Re-enable previously failing test - `System.Globalization.Tests.RegionInfoPropertyTests.DisplayName` #70711
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Predicate for valid Tracker Reference is inverted #70709
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr

Merged

  • Add doc on Unix temporary file security practice #70585
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Enable JitConsumeProfileForCasts by default #69869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete AssemblyName.CodeBase, AssemblyName.EscapedCodeBase #70534
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual properties duplicates elements #70592
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Do not use ExecutableMemoryAllocator on 64 bit platforms if default base address usage is requested #70563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #70741
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm] Make runtime_is_initialized promise callbacks one-shot #70694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Fix Debug configuration builds #70683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X #70447
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete tests for .NET Framework Xsltc.exe tool #70706
    area-System.Xml
  • Add SlidingWindow and FixedWindow to RateLimitPartition #68782
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Reenable C4244 in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf in WebUtility.HtmlDecode #70700
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid throwing Win32Exception from HTTP authentication #70474
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove dead code. #70671
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #70591
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Enable some previously failing WBT/AOT tests on windows #70595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix SOS tests on 7.0 #70677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't use a fixed listening port for the proxy #70681
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement digest one shots for browser implementation #70672
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Updating HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to not accelerate Vector256 APIs when AVX2 is unsupported #70686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #70537
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix value numbering of HWI loads #70621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [NO MERGE] Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    area-Infrastructure
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • Implement `Marshal.GetPInvokeErrorMessage()` API. #70685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Do not change `gtRetClsHnd` in `impNormStructVal` #70699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on x86/Unix x64 #70702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm][nodejs] Fix console template running with node, to always flush the output stream before exit #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
